name: Untitled Circle Game
description:
Intro:
So UCG is basically just a game made in one month by a random dude from Sweden with too much time on his hands. Even though I'm publishing it here I still consider it a Work In Progress so everything is due to change. Some elements of the game might be wonky and unbalanced but that's to be expected.

Instructions:
You can play the game with just the mouse but it's advised to use the keyboard.

P.S.:
I do have a Github for everything related to the game which I can publish if there's an interest.
Please consider leaving a comment no matter what's on your mind!
